<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/teams/{team_id}/list_projects"} context={"endpoint"} />

列出某个团队的所有项目。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"请求"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"team_id","in":"path","description":"团队 ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"TeamId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"请求体"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","slug","teamId","createTime"],"properties":{"createTime":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"以毫秒为单位的时间戳。"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"},"name":{"description":"完整的项目名称，包括空格和标点符号。","type":"string","title":"ProjectName"},"slug":{"description":"用于 Convex Dashboard URL 的项目名称短格式。","type":"string","title":"ProjectSlug"},"teamId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"TeamId"}},"title":"PlatformProjectDetails"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
